speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: Hey! We're dead if you don't help, all right? Either throw me something to crack open the back wall, or get these damn doors open. Hurry!

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: Your friend is some smooth talker to shut a guard down like that. What do you lot want with me, exactly?

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: You ordered that guard about as if you were the Absolute herself. What do you want with us, exactly?

speaker: Player
text: I'm here to help you escape.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: Huh. And why would you be so inclined?

speaker: Player
text: Barcus told me you were here, and asked me to help.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: ...Barcus is out here? Didn't think he had the stones.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: If he sent you, you're no slave to the Absolute. You're a damn wolf among sheep, aren't you?

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: I reckon you and I were meant to meet - I'm Wulbren.

speaker: Player
text: I'm [GEN_PlayerName_c11eee1e-7815-6143-7233-f2427799fa53] - pleasure to meet you.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: We've got a plan, for us and the tieflings both, but we're scuppered without the right equipment.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: We need tools. That headcase of a Warden robbed ours, but anything that breaks rock will do - even if it's not Ironhand quality.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: Whatever you find, throw it through the bars. But for the love of Gaerdal make sure a guard doesn't see you - or we're both done for.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: The necromancer has been hauling people off like cattle. We don't get out, we're dead - us, the tieflings, everyone.

text: The plan is to wait for a quiet moment, then bust out the back wall.

text: We'll grab the tieflings along the way - we'll need 'em if it comes to a fight.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: You, however, are the clincher. Once we move, keep the patrols busy. If the bastards spot us, all of bloody Moonrise will come down on us.

text: Were I to get such help, I'd be appreciative. But why would a True Soul be offering?

text: Huh. And why would you be so inclined?

speaker: Player
text: Barcus told me you were here, and asked me to help.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: ...Barcus is out here? Didn't think he had the stones.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: If he sent you, you're no slave to the Absolute. You're a damn wolf among sheep, aren't you?

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: I reckon you and I were meant to meet - I'm Wulbren.

speaker: Player
text: Let's talk escape plan - what do you need?

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: Efficient? Good.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: We need tools. That headcase of a Warden robbed ours, but anything that breaks rock will do - even if it's not Ironhand quality.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: Whatever you find, throw it through the bars. But for the love of Gaerdal make sure a guard doesn't see you - or we're both done for.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: Nimble! Check for gaps, cracks - anything to leverage the rock.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: Nickels: tools - get creative. This rock is basalt - it'll crack with enough pressure.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: Ah! Don't mind us, True Soul. The back wall is weak - we're working to brace it.

text: You're clearly planning an escape.

text: We've got a plan, for us and the tieflings both, but we're scuppered without the right equipment.

text: We need tools. That headcase of a Warden robbed ours, but anything that breaks rock will do - even if it's not Ironhand quality.

text: Whatever you find, throw it through the bars. But for the love of Gaerdal make sure a guard doesn't see you - or we're both done for.

text: I've a plan that'll make all of Moonrise rue the day they met us.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: Help me and we'll stick it to the Absolute - together.

speaker: Player
text: I promise nothing - thanks for the tip about the hole though.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: ...You're welcome. If you change your mind, I'll be here - not that I have much choice.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: The Absolute turned her back on you, did she? Don't take it to heart - it'll happen to the rest of them in due time.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: Cast your eyes to the back - see that hole yonder? I'd bet my last copper that's your ticket out.

speaker: Player
text: Convenient.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: There's likely a reason the cultists haven't blocked it off. But it leads out of here - and that's all that matters.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: I'd scamper sharpish - I've seen what the Warden does to the insubordinate. Leave, before she catches you.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: Hey - hey! You're the one who has Moonrise up in arms, aren't you?

speaker: Player
text: Maybe. Maybe not.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: Look - the guards are on a rampage, and we're next on the chopping block.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: We need to get out of here or we're stone dead. Get us tools, anything that could crack the wall behind us.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: Or find a way to get this damn door open. Hurry!

speaker: Player
text: Here. I found this hammer, is it yours?

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: Blessed, Gaerdal - I never thought I'd see it again. Thank you.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: The plan is to wait for a quiet moment, then bust out the back wall.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: We'll grab the tieflings along the way - we'll need 'em if it comes to a fight.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: You, however, are the clincher. Once we move, keep the patrols busy. If the bastards spot us, all of bloody Moonrise will come down on us.

speaker: Player
text: It's time. Let's do this.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: We'll move once it's quiet - until then, be ready.

text: Stop whining - at least I'm fighting back against the Absolute.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: At what cost? Do we deserve the knife for your folly?

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: We need to get out of here or we're stone dead. Get us tools, anything that could crack the wall behind us.

speaker: Wulbren Bongle
text: Or find a way to get this damn door open. Hurry!

speaker: Player
text: I have something that can break stone.
